Description: Granodiorite seated statue of Sekhmet; no disc; right hand damaged.
Curator's comments: Published: Wiese, Antikenmuseum Basel und Sammlung Ludwig Die Agyptische Abteilung (2001): No.60 PM II (2): p.265
Exhibition history: 2001-2014, Basel, Switzerland, Antikenmuseum. Long term loan. 2015-2016 4 Dec-27 Mar, Korea, Seoul Arts Centre, Human Image 2022 - 2023 8 Dec – 27 Aug, Canberra, National Museum of Australia, Feminine Power
